Message:
Marching in the depths of
darkness is my army of specters,
revived from death by
my magic power.

Not only are they fellow soldiers—
they’re lost souls.

It was like we made a
triumphant return home.

How absurd—not a single
person’s here to celebrate
our homecoming.

The capital exudes prosperity,
corruption, extravagance...
This city has grown fat as if
it was oblivious to the war.

That goes without saying.
We protected it, after all.

We risked our lives,
crawled through the battlefields,
evaded blades and bullets,

swam in mud and blood,
turned our world into nothing
but gunpowder, blood, and iron—
and we protected this damn city!

That’s why I—
we must make them learn...

That there’s something
that connects them to us.

That there’s one thing
that makes us all equal—
“death.”

Exterminate
the knaves who resist.
Leave the cowards who flee.

March until this land is filled
with nothing but silence.

Together, let us bring
this city to its knees!
